articles.title: Powerful Webb space telescope featuring Canadian instruments set for Dec. 18 launch - CTV News
articles.description: In just over a month, the world's largest, most advanced telescope will be launched into orbit from a spaceport in South America, and among those eagerly watching will be Montreal physics professor Rene Doyon.

articles.title: Overdose Deaths Reached Record High as the Pandemic Spread - The New York Times
articles.description: More than 100,000 Americans died from drug overdoses in the yearlong period ending in April, government researchers said.

articles.title: Once in a Century Partial Lunar Eclipse to Occur on Friday - Greek Reporter
articles.description: The longest partial lunar eclipse of the 21st century will occur this Friday. It will be visible to North America and will last 6 hours.
articles.content:
